title: Tunnels
description: Modern-day tunnels are quite extraordinary in their ability to move people and cargo quickly through mountains, underground, and even underwater. Tunnels provides students with a comprehensive look at various types of tunnels and their many benefits. The book can also be used to teach students how to visualize while reading and to accurately identify cause-and-effect relationships.
reviewWords: avoid, hidden, narrow, passages, pipes, safely
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Determine cause-and-effect relationships
awareness: Initial and Final Consonants : Discriminate initial and final consonant Pp
phonics: Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Pp
grammar: Simple Predicates                : Recognize and use simple predicates
wordWork: Concept Words                : Identify and use position words
